ghostPost.title: Missing SSL protocol
ghostPost.excerpt: Find out how to resolve errors with missing SSL protocol.
ghostPost.meta_title: How to resolve missing SSL protocol errors in Ghost - FAQ
ghostPost.meta_description: Find out how to resolve errors with missing SSL protocol for your Ghost publication.

primary_tag.name: Errors
primary_tag.description: Troubleshoot common errors and issues for the open source Ghost publishing platform!

ghostPost.plaintext:
After installing Ghost aurl  for your site is set. This is the URL people will
use to access your publication.

If you see an error of ERROR: URL in config must be provided with protocol  this
means the URL has been set with HTTPS but the SSL protocol is missing.

To fix
Use ghost setup ssl  in the ghost-cli  to setup an SSL certificate for your
publication.
ghostPost.html:
After installing Ghost a Â url for your site is set. This is the URL people will use to access your publication.

If you see an error of ERROR: URL in config must be provided with protocol this means the URL has been set with HTTPS but the SSL protocol is missing.

To fix

Use ghost setup ssl in the ghost-cli to setup an SSL certificate for your publication.
